about_the_game:
Quaver is a community-driven and open-source competitive rhythm game with two game modes and online leaderboards. Create your own maps, or challenge the world in online multiplayer matches.

This game is a fully-featured 4 and 7 key vertically scrolling rhythm game client complete with a sleek and minimalistic user interface.

  • Two Game Modes: Play the game with 4 keys or challenge yourself with 7. Each game mode has separate global and country leaderboards to compete on.

  • Online Multiplayer: Challenge up to 16 players in online multiplayer battles with a large focus on competition.

  • Fully-Featured Map Editor: Create your own maps to any of your favorite songs. Upload and share them with the world, and submit them for official ranking.

  • Advanced Skinning System: Completely customize your gameplay experience with the ability to create skins. Export and share your skins with friends or upload them to the Steam workshop.

  • Replay System: Go back in time by watching your previous scores. Watch replays from other players around the world, or export your own and share them with your rivals.

  • Steam Achievements: Become a master of Quaver by completing challenges and earning achievements!

  • 100% Community-Driven: See your ideas come to life in-game by submitting feature requests and suggestions!

  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
